headline: Aldevron and Integrated DNA Technologies Manufacture World’s First mRNA-based Personalized CRISPR Therapy
summary: FARGO, N.D. & CORALVILLE, Iowa, May 15, 2025--N of 1 therapy uniquely developed for infant with life-threatening rare metabolic disorder in six months by Aldevron and Integrated DNA Technologies.
